bioconda.name: bioconductor-chromheatmap
bioconda.summary: Heat map plotting by genome coordinate

biotools.summary: This package can be used to plot genome-wide data (e.g. expression, CGH, SNP) along each strand of a given chromosome as a heat map, that can be used to interactively identify probes and genes of interest.

bioschemas.name: ChromHeatMap
bioschemas.summary: This package can be used to plot genome-wide data (e.g. expression, CGH, SNP) along each strand of a given chromosome as a heat map, that can be used to interactively identify probes and genes of interest.
